00033 #ifndef __RAYOBJECT_H__

00040 struct Isect;

00044 
00045 /* RayObject
00046  * Can be a face/triangle, bvh tree, object instance, etc. This is the
00047  * public API used by the renderer, see rayobject_internal.h for the
00048  * internal implementation details.
00049  * */
00050 typedef struct RayObject RayObject;
00051 
00052 /* Intersection, see rayintersection.h */
00053 
00054 int RE_rayobject_raycast(RayObject *r, struct Isect *i);
00055 
00056 /* Acceleration Structures */
00057 
00058 RayObject* RE_rayobject_octree_create(int ocres, int size);
00059 RayObject* RE_rayobject_instance_create(RayObject *target, float transform[][4], void *ob, void *target_ob);
00060 RayObject* RE_rayobject_empty_create(void);
00061 
00062 RayObject* RE_rayobject_blibvh_create(int size);    /* BLI_kdopbvh.c   */
00063 RayObject* RE_rayobject_vbvh_create(int size);      /* raytrace/rayobject_vbvh.c */
00064 RayObject* RE_rayobject_svbvh_create(int size);     /* raytrace/rayobject_svbvh.c */
00065 RayObject* RE_rayobject_qbvh_create(int size);      /* raytrace/rayobject_qbvh.c */

00075 /* RayObject representing faces, all data is locally available instead
00076  * of referring to some external data structure, for possibly faster
00077  * intersection tests. */
00078 
00079 typedef struct RayFace {
00080     float v1[4], v2[4], v3[4], v4[3];
00081     int quad;
00082     void *ob;
00083     void *face;
00084 } RayFace;
00085 
00086 #define RE_rayface_isQuad(a) ((a)->quad)
00087 
00088 RayObject* RE_rayface_from_vlak(RayFace *face, struct ObjectInstanceRen *obi, struct VlakRen *vlr);
00089 
00090 /* RayObject representing faces directly from a given VlakRen structure. Thus
00091  * allowing to save memory, but making code triangle intersection dependent on
00092  * render structures. */
00093 
00094 typedef struct VlakPrimitive {
00095     struct ObjectInstanceRen *ob;
00096     struct VlakRen *face;
00097 } VlakPrimitive;
00098 
00099 RayObject* RE_vlakprimitive_from_vlak(VlakPrimitive *face, struct ObjectInstanceRen *obi, struct VlakRen *vlr);

00101 /* Bounding Box */
00102 
00103 /* extend min/max coords so that the rayobject is inside them */
00104 void RE_rayobject_merge_bb(RayObject *ob, float *min, float *max);
00105 
00106 /* initializes an hint for optimizing raycast where it is know that a ray will pass by the given BB often the origin point */
00107 void RE_rayobject_hint_bb(RayObject *r, struct RayHint *hint, float *min, float *max);
